   168	def get_vllm_port() -> Optional[int]:
   169	    """Get the port from VLLM_PORT environment variable.
   170	
   171	    Returns:
   172	        The port number as an integer if VLLM_PORT is set, None otherwise.
   173	
   174	    Raises:
   175	        ValueError: If VLLM_PORT is a URI, suggest k8s service discovery issue.
   176	    """
   177	    if 'VLLM_PORT' not in os.environ:
   178	        return None
   179	
   180	    port = os.getenv('VLLM_PORT', '0')
   181	
   182	    try:
   183	        return int(port)
   184	    except ValueError as err:
   185	        from urllib.parse import urlparse
   186	        parsed = urlparse(port)
   187	        if parsed.scheme:
   188	            raise ValueError(
   189	                f"VLLM_PORT '{port}' appears to be a URI. "
   190	                "This may be caused by a Kubernetes service discovery issue,"
   191	                "check the warning in: https://docs.vllm.ai/en/stable/serving/env_vars.html"
   192	            ) from None
   193	        raise ValueError(
   194	            f"VLLM_PORT '{port}' must be a valid integer") from err
